thread.title: LSU's Ben Simmons named SEC Preseason Player of the Year
thread.title_full: LSU's Ben Simmons named SEC Preseason Player of the Year

title: LSU's Ben Simmons named SEC Preseason Player of the Year
text:
FOXSPORTS LSU's Ben Simmons named SEC Preseason Player of the Year 
Ben Simmons, the potential top pick in the 2016 NBA Draft, was selected SEC Preseason Player of the Year. Brian Spurlock-USA TODAY Sports Oct 21, 2015 at 9:35a ET 0Shares 
LSU freshman forward Ben Simmons was named SEC Preseason Player of the Year on Wednesday morning at SEC Media Day in Charlotte. 
Simmons, a 6-foot-10 forward from Australia, was picked by media members. Kentucky center Skal Labissiere and Mississippi State guard Malik Newman were two other freshmen to receive preseason honors. 
First Team All-SEC 
Danuel House, Texas A&M 
Damian Jones, Vanderbilt
